NASA space shuttle orbit maps

  • 30 May 2024

Two NASA maps of space shuttle orbits from 1982/3, from the David Rumsey collection:

  • Space shuttle mission chart STS-9/SL-1. Front orbits 1-80
  • Space shuttle mission chart STS-6. Front- orbits:1-48
